about_the_game:
Sweet Volley High - A Yuri / Otome Visual Novel from NewWestGames
Sweet Volley High is the story of Aya Mizuki in her senior year at high school, and beyond, as she pursues a dream of becoming a professional volleyball player. Will she find romance and success, or rejection and heartbreak? Your choices will affect the outcome in one of 5 endings.

Date the girls... or not!
It's up to you! Your choices will lead you down a path towards dating Yuichi, Eri, Nanami or Yuka! Which one you choose is entirely up to you.

Features
  • An entirely original soundtrack by the amazing Sam Jean
  • Over 25 CGs
  • Partial voice acting
  • Steam achievements!
  • Trading cards!

highlighted.name: I See What You Did There

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu, Mint, Debian
  • Processor: Intel Celeron or Higher
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard or Higher
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu, Mint, Debian + others
  • Processor: Intel i3 or Higher
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia Geforce 640 or Higher
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Snow Leopard or Higher
  • Processor: Intel Celeron or Higher
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard or Higher
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mountain Lion or Higher
  • Processor: Intel i3 or Higher
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia Geforce 640 or Higher
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
